text:
@NYGovCuomo I think fuel pumps could be a source of transmission. It's the one place everyone gathers and there's no hand washing at the pump. Look at this map and the cases the trail from New Orleans and Austin, Texas. If I'm wrong I sincerely apologize.
 https://t.co/liC3cgkosI
